title: New Esports Org looking for team in OCE.
body:
Hello All.

As stated in the subject, we are a new OCE Esports Organisation seeking to pickup / form a professional League of legends team. Qlick Gaming is owned and operated by two veteran Gamers, one from the League of Legends Scene, and one from the Counter-Strike Global Offensive scene.

We are looking for players ranging between Diamond - Challenger, that will be interested and available to compete in online and offline tournaments, with goals to become the top team in OCE.

In addition to a LoL team, we are also in talks with multiple CS:GO teams in the hopes of penetrating the FPS scene.

If this is something that interests you, please email management@qlickgaming.com with your in game name/s, why you are looking to join an organisation, and any past experience playing for a team competitively.

All applications will be taken into consideration.

Regards,

Bearabouts
Community Manager
Qlick Gaming
